movie_title: Can Sadie Sink Finish These Broadway Lyrics?
introduction:
At the 2025 Tony Awards, Sadie Sink tries to finish some famous lyrics from Broadway musicals.

Stil

vocabulary.definition: to occupy oneself in a leisurely or aimless manner
vocabulary.example: She liked to putter around the garden on weekends.

vocabulary.definition: full of fighting spirit; determined and tenacious
vocabulary.example: Despite facing many obstacles, he had a scrappy attitude towards achieving his goals.

vocabulary.definition: having a strong desire or craving for something
vocabulary.example: After the long hike, they were hungry for a hearty meal.

vocabulary.definition: the middle of the night; 12 o'clock at night
vocabulary.example: They decided to meet at midnight to avoid the crowds.

vocabulary.definition: to bring something to an end; to complete
vocabulary.example: She worked hard to finish the project before the deadline.

vocabulary.definition: a noise, especially when it is considered pleasant or harmonious
vocabulary.example: The sound of waves crashing on the shore was soothing.
